lead_paragraph: The Kips Bay Decorator Show House features 21 design firms in a new Upper East Side townhouse.

headline.print_headline: Saints to the Left, Napoleon to the Right
headline.main: Kips Bay Offers a Colorful Answer to Décor Sameness

snippet: The Kips Bay Decorator Show House features 21 design firms in a new Upper East Side townhouse.
abstract: Kips Bay Decorator Show House provides colorful and ornate counterpoint to minimalist interiors with work of 21 design firms in Manhattan town house.
